Owlhawk evaluated the situation. Flicker had dropped Hightlight, but
he was still too near for the Maximals to attempt anything without
risks. On the other hand, if the spy killed her right away, he would
have no more hostage.

Then he thought of something else. Condor was dead, so it was time for
a payback. Owlhawk had never had the chance to successfully use this
weapon, but he decided to give it a try. He changed both his wings to
machine guns and opened his chest cannon. He first fired his left
wing, then, without waiting, charged and fired his cannon and finished
off with the right wing.

Owlhawk: We shall see who understands...

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Flicker::
> 
> Flicker vaults over Aerotaur's head and lands over Nightlight with 
> plasama rifle blazing on full rock'n'roll - 12 shots in all aimed at 
> Aerotaur's torso.  "You really don't understands Predacons, do you?"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Windlord:
> > 
> > "Aerotaur, look out!!!"warned Windlord "I don't like other 
> > Funeral..."
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> > > ::Aerotaur::
> > >        He takes the shots from Carnatron in the chest, arms, and 
> > wings 
> > > wincing with every hit.  It forces him back a step and he 
> grimaces 
> > but spares 
> > > a glance over his shoulder at Nightlight who he sees is 
> > unconscious.  
> > > "Flicker, you can end this right now.  Tell him to cease fire and 
> > I'll take 
> > > Nightlight home.  You've already got what you wanted, you're home 
> > free.  You 
> > > don't need her anymore."
